item.description:
Sorry canceled due to cold and rain. Please take time to honor and remember our veterans who served to bring us our freedom

PLEASE WATCH..I WILL POST CHANGE IN A.M....IF WEATHER IS HORRIBLE I WILL BE CANCELLING THIS RIDE...SORRY BUT I DO NOT WANT TO TAKE CHANCES ON POOR RIDING CONDITIONS FOR ANYONE

 

We will meet at the Whitman VFW 9:30 - 10:30, Kickstands up at 11:00. Ride will be led by American Legion Riders. We will ride directly to Cohasset, I believe we may be being met and escorted in. All bikes have reserved parking. This is an awesome sight to see.

 Thanks,

Karen

Address of VFW is :

  • 95 Essex Street
  • Whitman, MA

Any questions contact Karen Dias

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Field Of Honor
